definition: unified government purchase at fixed price (esp of farm products)
state monopoly of purchasing and marketing

sentences.english: The State practices monopoly for the purchase and marketing of ephedrine.
sentences.chinese: 國家對麻黃素實行統購統銷。

sentences.english: State-owned military enterprises are no longer the purchase processing workshops of the state.
sentences.chinese: 邦無軍工企業出無再非邦度統購包賣的加工車間。

sentences.english: The state purchases grain at standard prices.
sentences.chinese: 我們統購糧食，是按照正常的價格。

sentences.english: State-owned military enterprises are no longer the purchase processing workshops of the state.
sentences.chinese: 國有軍工企業不再是國家統購包銷的加工車間。
